Chongkai Gao 高崇凯

  Master student

  Department of Automation, Tsinghua University

  Email: gck20@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn

  CV • Google Scholar • GitHub • Twitter • Zhihu

I am a final-year Master student in VIPLAB at Department of Automation, Tsinghua University, where I am supervised by Prof. Feng Chen. I received my Bachelor's degree from Department of Automation, Tsinghua University in 2020.

My research interest lies in robot learning: training real-world intelligent robots and building AGI systems.

I am looking for a PhD program to enroll in the fall of 2023! Feel free to contact to me through E-mail or WeChat (ID: Chong-kai).

  • [July, 2021] One paper accepted by IROS 2021!
